haiku: Robed in silence deep / He leads his brothers in prayer / Bells call them to God
Step around the crack / Some things are best left alone / Wisdom knows when not
He surveys his lands / Power built on older power / Titles pass like coins
Mixed together now / One bowl holds the future bread / Heat transforms the whole
The silence then sound / Everything changes at once / Echoes fade to dust
Edge of everything / One step more and gravity wins / Beauty laced with fear
Glasses touch in toast / Crystal voices celebrate / To what lies ahead
Hold it to your ear / The ocean trapped inside speaks / Waves from far away
Pain dealt without need / Some wounds serve no purpose known / Why hurt what you can
Three dimensions meet / Space contained in equal sides / Geometry's gift
Each piece placed just so / The room tells a story whole / Beauty in the plan
Something's off with him / Trust your gut when it warns you / Not all smiles are kind
Light fades to purple / Day hands off to coming night / The between hour calls
Two fours make this whole / Infinity laid on its side / Count and count again
Animals can speak / In stories teaching us truths / The moral remains
Heat rolls off in waves / Passion burns too hot to touch / Intense and alive
Young hooves test the ground / All energy and no fear / Speed before wisdom
Different from the rest / What seems strange just hasn't fit / Normal is a cage
Sun made this sweetness / Seeds wrapped in tempting bright flesh / Eat and spread the life
A blade of sunlight / Cuts the edge of the moment / Then nothing remains
Green carpet spreads wide / Beneath bare feet cool and soft / Earth's simplest pleasure
Everything goes in / Flavors mix in the dark roux / Louisiana sings
Energy that burns / Too much too fast without rest / The crash will come soon
Gift of ancient kings / Incense from another time / Sacred smoke rises
Lacking what it needs / Add force to make impact felt / Power finds its mark
Southern sweetness hides / Inside the hard shell waits / Pie filling to be
The group rides as one / Searching for what must be found / Numbers add to strength
Light enters as one / Exits scattered into many / Rainbow in the glass
This shows it is true / The argument rests on facts / Believe what is shown
Smaller than the small / Building blocks for building blocks / Physics goes deeper
Pieces stitched to whole / Warmth made from scraps of other things / History in fabric
Fast is all she knows / The clock is the enemy / Winning needs no brake
Bodies clash and strain / The ball moves through pure will / Mud and glory mixed
From one thought to next / Seamlessly the bridge connects / Conversation flows
The sound pierces all / Warning or temptation calls / Either way take note
Fast becomes the goal / Time compresses in the rush / Slow is left behind
Thread waits in still loops / Patient circles hold their breath / Until hands give motion
The walk says it all / Confidence in every step / See me as I go
The name is now stained / What was pure has been muddied / Reputation damaged
Red clusters hang bright / The tart spice waits to be ground / Middle Eastern tang
The proving begins / What is claimed must be shown true / Evidence decides
The color of death / Pale and slightly shining / Life drained away
The absence of color / Snow and bone and clean sheets share / Purity in hue
